description: The `ballerinax/sap.s4hana.api_inforecord_process_srv` package offers APIs for seamless integration with the [Purchasing Info Record API v1.0.0](https://api.sap.com/api/API_INFORECORD_PROCESS_SRV/overview). This synchronous inbound service allows the creation, modification, and deletion of purchasing info records, complete with conditions. The service encompasses general data, purchasing organization data, and conditions.
